title: Osher Center in the News Archives - Osher Center For Integrative Medicine
author: Peter Wayne
cleaned_text: Events](https://oshercenter.org/news-events/?all) Peter Wayne Named Director of the Harvard Osher Center for Integrative Medicine Posted On: July 22nd, 2020 We are delighted to share that on July 2nd, Peter Wayne, PhD was appointed to the role of director of the Osher Center for Integrative Medicine at Harvard Medical School and Brigham and Women's...
